long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TEXO is a productivity tool that stores commonly used content and instantly inserts the content into any Chrome document. Enter data into Texo Editor and it's available for any Chrome web age to instantly insert.

Useful for anyone who regularly inserts information into Chrome documents like Email that has to be 100% accurate and conform with company standards.

Version 1.2 is for text only. Future versions will enable insertion of graphics.

Comments/suggestions to gregtwem@gmail.com. Find me on LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/in/gregtwemlow
